generalInfo:
Explore the fascinating state of Rajasthan by Rail. This itinerary has four train journeys, one of them being overnight.

It starts in Delhi for a few days to experience the sights and sounds of this bustling city.

Then take a train and visit the off the beaten track Shekhawati city of Churu - see its heritage buildings, murals and craftspeople in action.

Board another train to Bikaner with its markets, forts, camels and for those not squeamish a temple dedicated to rats!

Jaisalmer is the desert city and you have a few days here to explore the area.

Take a train to the blue city of Jodhpur with the imposing Mehrangarh Fort.

Get off the grid and stay in the gorgeous Kot Dunara, take a farm visit and immerse yourself in the culture and cuisine with your host family.

Your last stop in Rajasthan is the lake city of Udaipur.

Take an overnight train back to Delhi for your flight home.

This tour doesn't include Jaipur or Ranthambhore National Park - so these can be added to the itinerary if you would like to visit these areas.

dayInfo.description: Depart the UK. Virgin direct from Heathrow.
Full day sightseeing tour. Morning - Old Delhi. Afternoon - New Delhi. Overnight: Haveli Hauz Khas
Arrive in Delhi. Afternoon visit to Dilli-Haat, followed by visit to the INA market. Evening - cooking class & dinner with an Indian family. Overnight: Haveli Hauz Khas
Transfer to railway station. Depart Delhi 08:40 arrive Churu 13:08. Afternoon at leisure. Evening sundowners on the dunes. Overnight: Malji Ka Kamra

Start the day with a visit to a school for the disabled. After enjoy a walking tour of the al fresco-painted havelis. Picnic lunch at Prem Sarovar. Afternoon Jeep Safari. Candle-lit dinner at Johan/Kund. Overnight: Malji Ka Kamra
Morning at leisure. Transfer to railway station. Afternoon train. Depart Churu 13:13 arrive Bikaner 16:20. Transfer to hotel. Evening at leisure. Overnight: Cavalry Villa
Start the day with a walking tour of the market. Later visit Junagarh Fort. After lunch visit camel breeding farm & Karni Mata Temple. Overnight: Cavalry Villa
After breakfast, drive from Bikaner to Jaisalmer via Gajner. [Approx. 7 hrs] Overnight: The Gulaal

Morning visit Rani Ratnavanti Girls School. [Closed on Sunday and National Holidays] Later visit Gadi-sagar lake; Jaisalmer Fort; Patwaon-ki-Haveli; Nathmal-Ki-Haveli & local market. Overnight: The Gulaal
Morning at leisure. Afternoon train, depart Jaisalmer 15:30 arrive Jodhpur 20:55. Transfer to hotel. Overnight: Ratan Vilas
Visit Mehrangarh Fort; Jaswant Thada; Umain Bhawan Palace Museum. Lunch at Khaas Bagh on direct basis. Afternoon walk through clock-tower; blue-city 7 local market. Overnight: Ratan Vilas
Jodhpur to Dhundhara (approx. 1.5hrs) Overnight: Kot Dunara
Day at leisure on own. (You can opt Artisan Safari with tea/snacks, Farm visit with high tea, Elaborate cooking demo followed by meal with the family at additional cost). Overnight: Kot Dunara
Dhundhara to Udaipur (approx. 6 hrs) Overnight: Amet Haveli
Morning city tour of Udaipur visiting City Palace; Crystal Gallery; Jagdish Temple; Sahelion-Ki-Bari & local market. Evening exclusive boat ride on Lake Pichola. Overnight: Amet Haveli
Full day at leisure. Morning (Optional) Jal-Sanjhi art. [Late check out subject to room availability] Evening train. Depart Udaipur 18:30 arrive Delhi 07:10 +1. Overnight on train.
Arrival and transfer to hotel. Room booked from previous Night for immediate check in. Breakfast and day at leisure. Overnight: Haveli Hauz Khas
Transfer to International airport for your flight home with Virgin.
